title: PCI Compliance Requirements
content:
# PCI DSS Compliance Requirements

## PCI DSS v4.0 Requirements

### 1. Network Security
- Firewalls protect cardholder data
- No default passwords on systems
- Network segmentation enforced

### 2. Data Protection
- Encrypt cardholder data in transit and at rest
- Never store CVV after authorization
- Mask PAN when displaying (show only last 4)

### 3. Access Control
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Multi-factor authentication required
- Unique IDs for system access

### 4. Monitoring
- Log all access to cardholder data
- Regular security monitoring
- Incident response plan maintained

### 5. Security Testing
- Quarterly vulnerability scans
- Annual penetration testing
- Code review for payment flows

## Tokenization
- All cards tokenized via payment gateway
- No raw card data stored in database
- Tokens used for recurring payments

## Audit Logs
All payment transactions logged with:
- Timestamp
- User ID
- Transaction type
- Amount
- Success/failure status

## Annual Assessment
- Self-Assessment Questionnaire (SAQ)
- Attestation of Compliance (AOC)
- Third-party security audit
